title: GitLab security advisory (AV26-044)
description: On January 21, 2026, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)   versions prior to 18.8.2, 18.7.2 and 18.6.4
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)   versions prior to 18.8.2, 18.7.2 and 18.6.4
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
